channel.title: Is rsc p-servers dying? just curious if anyone is doing rscps anymore
channel.description: hey i was wondering if anyone was was still making servers anymore for the rsc community or is still running there's thanks

item.title: Is rsc p-servers dying? just curious if anyone is doing rscps anymore
item.dc:creator: @my-swagger my-swagger
item.description:
@my-swagger wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:9, topic:555605”][quote author=my-swagger link=topic=674817.msg4509804#msg4509804 date=1466367536]

[quote author=KizL link=topic=674817.msg4509800#msg4509800 date=1466356205]

RSCREVOLUTION is still going strong and works on android phones.

~K!zL

That’s some bs. I tried it on android just now and sure the client loads up but how can I input username/password? No keyboard shows up.
[/quote]You need another keyboard app obviously yours is outdated.[/quote]
Wtf man, can I not use the most RECENT updated android version/keyboard? Google keyboard also does not work.

Sorry man. Don’t blame my phone because you can’t make ur crap support all major things.

Sounds like you’re just trying to blame some bs.
Even my samsung S6 can log in.[/quote]
What android version and keyboard are you using?

Read full topic
item.source: Is rsc p-servers dying? just curious if anyone is doing rscps anymore

item.title: Is rsc p-servers dying? just curious if anyone is doing rscps anymore
item.dc:creator: @KizL KizL
item.description:
@KizL wrote:

[quote=“my-swagger, post:5, topic:555605”][quote author=KizL link=topic=674817.msg4509715#msg4509715 date=1466092774]
RSCREVOLUTION is still going strong and works on android phones.

~K!zL
[/quote]
That’s some bs. I tried it on android just now and sure the client loads up but how can I input username/password? No keyboard shows up.[/quote]You need another keyboard app obviously yours is outdated.

[quote author=echaze link=topic=674817.msg4509743#msg4509743 date=1466138502]

[quote author=my-swagger link=topic=674817.msg4509722#msg4509722 date=1466099607]

[quote=“KizL, post:4, topic:555605”]RSCREVOLUTION is still going strong and works on android phones.

yeah i know. ive had the app its okay. nothing compared to the client thought but it runs it nothing to complain about that and i havent played rscr do to life and such other games plus if i remember correctly they had a few resets and wipes when i was playing so i really didnt care to grind it back in and no one i know plays anymore that use to[/quote]
Hasn’t been wiped in over 2 years and there’s no plan to do so.

~K!zL

Read full topic
